安装方法：
打开MC，在设置中找到资源包选项，点进去，资源包打开文件夹，将下载的资源包丢进去即可
Installation, Tutorials and Miscellanous

Installing the Pack itself:
Download the .zip file (Do not unzip)
Navigate to your ‘resourcepacks’ folder
Drag and drop the .zip
Load up Minecraft, click the resource packs button and click the pack.
Swapping for alternates:
Download a program suitable for navigating or unzipping the .zip (I personally recommend 7-zip but WinRAR is good too).
Open two sessions of the pack.
In one of the sessions, navigate to the folder called ‘ALTERNATES’ under /assets/minecraft/
Browse the alternates for the one(s) you want to change.
In the other session, navigate to where the normal one is located. For example chest textures are under /assets/minecraft/textures/entity/chest (just search if you can’t find it)
Rename the alternate to whatever it’s called in the normal area. For example ‘grass_side_snowed_alt’ to simply ‘grass_side_snowed’
Drag, drop and replace the other file.
